Class DBSStatusHandle

java.lang.Object
  DBSStatusHandle
public class DBSStatusHandle
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles different status types and their effect on characters. Like DBSTypeHandle, this is a completely static class.

Version:
0.1 Java
Author:
Evan Hildreth, root -1 Entertainment

Method Detail

Act

public static boolean Act(int status,
                          DBSCharacter inflicted)
Does stuff to the character based on status inflicted. Returns whether or not character is allowed to have a turn.

Parameters:
status - Status inflicted (use public constants)
inflicted - DBSCharacter inflicted with said status
Returns:
If inflicted can have a turn

returns true if status is a given status in this class
